title: BCT Circular 2024-01: Export Finance Requirements
summary: Mandates that all export pre-financing loans above 500k TND require a validated purchase order domiciled at the bank.

title: BCT Circular 2023-14: SME Credit Guarantee Scheme
summary: Loans for equipment acquisition by manufacturing SMEs are eligible for SOTUGAR guarantee up to 70%.

title: BCT Circular 2022-08: Debt-to-Income Ratios
summary: Corporate debt service coverage ratio (DSCR) must stay above 1.2x for new long-term facilities.

title: BCT Circular 2025-02: Digital Onboarding Standards
summary: Digital KYC is accepted for accounts with annual turnover < 200k TND. Higher tiers require physical interview.
